projects.title: Instagram Clone
projects.description: This project is a partial clone of instagram that I created using React. It includes a home page, a profile page, and a way to upload new posts. It utilizes React Router to support various navigations in the app and saves user data into a remote database using Firestore. The source code can be found on my GitHub. (Please note that the clone is modeled after an older version of Instagram)

experience.title: IT Help Desk Technician
experience.description: Currently working for Boston College IT Services as a help desk technician. Helping students and faculty with all technology related issues and guiding them through installation processes involving BC's various networks and applications.

experience.title: Coach for Vanta Leagues
experience.description: Instructed 8 students aged 9-14 using Google Classroom and managed 3 weekly coaching sessions and 1-2 weekly game day. Prioritized a non-toxic, structured, and enjoyable coaching session with our main goal being teamwork/collaboration and overall character development and maturity through esports.
